TopicTitle: Show part in the briefing description of a Test-contract

Articles.Content:
Currently only the name of the part to be tested is displayed in the briefing.

Since I don't know the names of the parts and have to look them up on the wiki-stockparts page, I want to suggest to include a picture of the part in the briefing description for a more simple recognization which does not require me to Alt-Tab out of the game.
I agree with this. I'm pretty sure this will be implemented once the Mission Control Building becomes more refined, Just like we now have two tabs in the R&D facility.

I agree. Incidentally, so do all these people:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88680-Include-picture-of-part-in-contract-description

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86455-Contract-Parts-Pictures
In the VAB, look at the name of the contract and look at the name of the part, so you don't have to alt-tab out.
